constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components are read-only).
Do not modify the immutable hook/entry files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths.

nonGoals: Internet Identity or any other login/authentication flow.
